chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 13 Pro has the following issue:
The camera is scratched, it's the only flaw of the phone but I wanted to know if it's possible to replace it without having other defects, because the phone seems perfect otherwise (display intact, shock-absorbing case intact, battery 100%, and so on).
Is there a phone with the same battery capacity and fewer aesthetic flaws? Even at a different price. Thank you!

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

I am taking the liberty of contacting you following a customer request.

He has received an item that does not meet his expectations. There are scratches on the camera. You can view the photos sent by the customer in the shared files.

As a result, the customer wants to replace it with a similar item. And we'd like to know if it's available in stock.

In the meantime, I thank you for your understanding and wish you an excellent day.

Regards,
Tiana-Rijamalala from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We would like to politely offer a commercial gesture of 40 euros for the inconvenience caused. We hope these solutions would prove helpful to you, and will not necessitate a return which will generate a lot of harmful carbon emissions, as the phone do not have any hardware issues. We will await your response. Thank you.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile,

J'ai pris note de votre message et je vous en remercie.

Avant d'informer le client, l'article de remplacement est-il disponible en stock, s'il vous plaît ?

Regards,
Tiana-Rijamalala from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

There is no replacement item available in stock currently. Hope you understand. Thank you.

Regards,
KW
